Ooooooohhhhh this is gonna be fun.
Rob Liefeld was a comic book writer and illustrator who got REALLY famous in the early ninties. Here's just a taste of his _wonderful_ art work.

!unrealitymag.bcmediagroup.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/rob-liefeld3.jpg!
